mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (id, name, gender, age, school, grade, contact, parent_contact) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{school}, #{grade}, #{contact}, #{parentContact})
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, age = #{age}, school = #{school}, grade = #{grade}, contact = #{contact}, parent_contact = #{parentContact} WHERE id = #{id}
